00025 GeneratorChain::ComponentGeneratorSelector::ComponentGeneratorSelector(
00026                 QDomNode &selectorNode): operator_(General::OR), groupNames_() {
00027 
00028         QDomNode groupNode;
00029 
00030         for (int k = 0; k < selectorNode.childNodes().count(); ++k) {
00031                 if (selectorNode.childNodes().at(k).nodeName() ==
00032                                 QString("spirit:groupSelector")) {
00033                         groupNode = selectorNode.childNodes().at(k);
00034                 }
00035         }
00036 
00037         // get the groupSelectionOperator attribute
00038         QDomNamedNodeMap attributeMap = groupNode.attributes();
00039         operator_ = General::str2GroupSelector(attributeMap.namedItem(QString(
00040                         "spirit:multipleGroupSelectionOperator")).nodeValue(),
00041                         General::OR);
00042 
00043         for (int i = 0; i < groupNode.childNodes().count(); ++i) {
00044                 if (groupNode.childNodes().at(i).nodeName() ==
00045                                 QString("spirit:name")) {
00046                         groupNames_.append(groupNode.childNodes().at(i).childNodes().
00047                                         at(0).nodeValue());
00048                 }
00049         }
00050 
00051         // at least one name has to be found
00052         if (groupNames_.size() < 1) {
00053                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element name missing in "
00054                                 "spirit:componentGeneratorSelector"));
00055         }
00056 }
00057 
00058 GeneratorChain::GeneratorChain(QDomDocument &doc):
00059 LibraryComponent(doc),
00060 hidden_(false), 
00061 displayName_(QString()),
00062 genChainSelectors_(),
00063 compGenSelectors_(),
00064 generators_(),
00065 chainGroups_(), 
00066 choices_(),
00067 attributes_() {
00068 
00069         LibraryComponent::vlnv_->setType(VLNV::GENERATORCHAIN);
00070 
00071         // find the IP-Xact root element (spirit:component or spirit:design ...)
00072         QDomNodeList nodeList = doc.childNodes();
00073         int i = 0;
00074         // search for the first element with children (=document type)
00075         while (!nodeList.at(i).hasChildNodes()) {
00076                 ++i;
00077         }
00078 
00079         QDomNode generatorChainNode = doc.childNodes().item(i);
00080 
00081         // parse the attributes
00082         General::parseAttributes(generatorChainNode, attributes_);
00083 
00084         // get the hidden attribute
00085         QDomNamedNodeMap attributeMap = generatorChainNode.attributes();
00086         QString hidden = attributeMap.namedItem("spirit:hidden").nodeValue();
00087         hidden_ = General::str2Bool(hidden, false);
00088 
00089         for (int i = 0; i < generatorChainNode.childNodes().count(); ++i) {
00090                 QDomNode tempNode = generatorChainNode.childNodes().at(i);
00091 
00092                 if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:generatorChainSelector")) {
00093                         genChainSelectors_.append(QSharedPointer<GeneratorChainSelector>(
00094                                 new GeneratorChainSelector(tempNode)));
00095                 }
00096 
00097                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() ==
00098                         QString("spirit:componentGeneratorSelector")) {
00099                                 compGenSelectors_.append(QSharedPointer<ComponentGeneratorSelector>(
00100                                         new ComponentGeneratorSelector(tempNode)));
00101                 }
00102 
00103                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:generator")) {
00104                         generators_.append(QSharedPointer<Generator>(
00105                                 new Generator(tempNode)));
00106                 }
00107 
00108                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:chainGroup")) {
00109                         chainGroups_.append(tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue());
00110                 }
00111 
00112                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:displayName")) {
00113                         displayName_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00114                 }
00115 
00116                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:choices")) {
00117 
00118                         // go through all choices
00119                         for (int j = 0; j < tempNode.childNodes().count(); ++j) {
00120                                 QDomNode choiceNode = tempNode.childNodes().at(j);
00121                                 choices_.append(QSharedPointer<Choice>(
00122                                         new Choice(choiceNode)));
00123                         }
00124                 }
00125         }
00126 
00127         // if mandatory elements are missing
00128 
00129         if ((genChainSelectors_.size() < 1) &&
00130                 (compGenSelectors_.size() < 1) &&
00131                 (generators_.size() < 1 )) {
00132                         throw Parse_error(QObject::tr(
00133                                 "No generators found in spirit:generatorChain"));
00134         }
00135         return;
00136 }

00138 GeneratorChain::GeneratorChain( const GeneratorChain &other ):
00139 LibraryComponent(other),
00140 hidden_(other.hidden_),
00141 displayName_(other.displayName_),
00142 genChainSelectors_(),
00143 compGenSelectors_(),
00144 generators_(),
00145 chainGroups_(),
00146 choices_(),
00147 attributes_(other.attributes_) {
00148 
00149         foreach (QSharedPointer<GeneratorChainSelector> genChain, other.genChainSelectors_) {
00150                 if (genChain) {
00151                         QSharedPointer<GeneratorChainSelector> copy = QSharedPointer<GeneratorChainSelector>(
00152                                 new GeneratorChainSelector(*genChain.data()));
00153                         genChainSelectors_.append(copy);
00154                 }
00155         }
00156 
00157         foreach (QSharedPointer<ComponentGeneratorSelector> selector, other.compGenSelectors_) {
00158                 if (selector) {
00159                         QSharedPointer<ComponentGeneratorSelector> copy = QSharedPointer<ComponentGeneratorSelector>(
00160                                 new ComponentGeneratorSelector(*selector.data()));
00161                         compGenSelectors_.append(copy);
00162                 }
00163         }
00164 
00165         foreach (QSharedPointer<Generator> generator, other.generators_) {
00166                 if (generator) {
00167                         QSharedPointer<Generator> copy = QSharedPointer<Generator>(
00168                                 new Generator(*generator.data()));
00169                         generators_.append(copy);
00170                 }
00171         }
00172 
00173         foreach (QSharedPointer<Choice> choice, other.choices_) {
00174                 if (choice) {
00175                         QSharedPointer<Choice> copy = QSharedPointer<Choice>(
00176                                 new Choice(*choice.data()));
00177                         choices_.append(copy);
00178                 }
00179         }
00180 }

00183 GeneratorChain & GeneratorChain::operator=( const GeneratorChain &other ) {
00184         if (this != &other) {
00185                 LibraryComponent::operator=(other);
00186 
00187                 hidden_ = other.hidden_;
00188                 displayName_ = other.displayName_;
00189                 chainGroups_ = other.chainGroups_;
00190                 attributes_ = other.attributes_;
00191 
00192                 genChainSelectors_.clear();
00193                 foreach (QSharedPointer<GeneratorChainSelector> genChain, other.genChainSelectors_) {
00194                         if (genChain) {
00195                                 QSharedPointer<GeneratorChainSelector> copy = QSharedPointer<GeneratorChainSelector>(
00196                                         new GeneratorChainSelector(*genChain.data()));
00197                                 genChainSelectors_.append(copy);
00198                         }
00199                 }
00200 
00201                 compGenSelectors_.clear();
00202                 foreach (QSharedPointer<ComponentGeneratorSelector> selector, other.compGenSelectors_) {
00203                         if (selector) {
00204                                 QSharedPointer<ComponentGeneratorSelector> copy = QSharedPointer<ComponentGeneratorSelector>(
00205                                         new ComponentGeneratorSelector(*selector.data()));
00206                                 compGenSelectors_.append(copy);
00207                         }
00208                 }
00209 
00210                 generators_.clear();
00211                 foreach (QSharedPointer<Generator> generator, other.generators_) {
00212                         if (generator) {
00213                                 QSharedPointer<Generator> copy = QSharedPointer<Generator>(
00214                                         new Generator(*generator.data()));
00215                                 generators_.append(copy);
00216                         }
00217                 }
00218 
00219                 choices_.clear();
00220                 foreach (QSharedPointer<Choice> choice, other.choices_) {
00221                         if (choice) {
00222                                 QSharedPointer<Choice> copy = QSharedPointer<Choice>(
00223                                         new Choice(*choice.data()));
00224                                 choices_.append(copy);
00225                         }
00226                 }
00227         }
00228         return *this;
00229 }

00244 void GeneratorChain::write(QFile& file) {
00245         // create a writer instance and set it to operate on the given file
00246         QXmlStreamWriter writer(&file);
00247 
00248         // call the base class implementation to write the top comment and
00249         // vlvn info. It also starts the <spirit:busDefinition> element
00250         LibraryComponent::write(writer);
00251 
00252         // own code here
00253 
00254         writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:busDefinition
00255         writer.writeEndDocument();
00256         return;
00257 
00258 }

00351 const QStringList GeneratorChain::getDependentFiles() const {
00352         QStringList fileList;
00353 
00354         for (int i = 0; i < generators_.size(); ++i) {
00355                 fileList.append(generators_.at(i)->getGeneratorExe());
00356         }
00357         return fileList;
00358 }

00360 const QList<VLNV> GeneratorChain::getDependentVLNVs() const {
00361         QList<VLNV> vlnvList;
00362 
00363         // get the vlnvs of the generator chains that are included in this
00364         // generator chain
00365         for (int i = 0; i < genChainSelectors_.size(); ++i) {
00366 
00367                 if (genChainSelectors_.at(i)->getGeneratorChainRef().isValid()) {
00368                         vlnvList.append(genChainSelectors_.at(i)->getGeneratorChainRef());
00369                 }
00370         }
00371         return vlnvList;
00372 }
